title: Exclusive: France players rally round captain Guilhem Guirado and block coaches' attempts to depose him
text:
France’s senior players have given their unequivocal backing to captain Guilhem Guirado after blocking an attempt by Jacques Brunel and assistant Fabien Galthié to remove the hooker from his position.

Guirado is expected to be named among the replacements for Saturday’s game with England - a team which Maxime Médard has called “tonnes better” than France - after falling out with the coaching staff, who wanted to strip him of the captaincy before the Six Nations.

It is understood the majority of the squad objected and, in a show of player power, have insisted that Guirado remain their...
description: France’s senior players have given their unequivocal backing to captain Guilhem Guirado after blocking an attempt by Jacques Brunel and assistant Fabien Galthié to remove the hooker from his position.
